Grants +0 damage and +0 HP to a Tower. When used on Frog Tower, Hydra Tower, Snake Tower, or Witch Tower, the effect is additionally applied to another random Tower.

Gives the selected Tower milk.

Grants +0 HP regen to a Tower.
Gives the selected Tower TEMPORARY +0 damage bonus and +0 HP bonus.

Removal Token Parmesan Discount Voucher Paper Hand Fan Vagabond's Sack Right to Ownership Perpetual Spinning Top Archaeologist's Hat Stairway to Heaven Golden Goose Red Data Book Poker Chip Stone of Simplicity Stone of Refinement Hourglass
Improves the chance of uncommon and rare Towers appearing.
Towers cost 1 gold less.
Grants 7 gold at the start of a round.
All TEMPORARY HP and damage bonuses are increased by 50%.
All Towers gain a TEMPORARY +8 damage and +8 HP bonus at the start of a battle.
If a rare Tower receives Milk, that Tower gains +2 damage. Rare Towers cost 1 gold less. Every 3 turns each Tower receives Milk.
If there are less than 5 Towers in the Tower Store during your turn, the Towers are added so that there are at least 5 Towers.
If you haven‚Äôt bought any Towers in a round, Tower Store gets a different choice of Towers next round. This effect also applies to Re-roll.

Animal-themed Towers gain +8 HP at the end of each round. Applies to: Cat Tower, Rat Tower, Cow Tower, Mosquito Tower, Snake Tower, Frog Tower, Horse Tower, Bear Tower, Bee Tower, Hydra Tower, Dragon Tower, Cerberus Tower, Mole Tower.
At the start of a round, adds a completely random Animal Tower to the Tower Store.
Gain an extra Tower slot.
Max level is now unlimited for all Towers.

There can be no identical Towers in the Tower store.
+1 Tower is added to the Tower store.
The maximum level of all Towers is increased by 1.
Towers that have reached the maximum level no longer appear in the Tower store.
Common Towers are 1 gold cheaper. +1 common Tower is added to the Tower store. The maximum level of common Towers is increased by 1.
The first Tower you buy each round costs 0 . You can‚Äôt have more than 20 gold.

Cat Token Milk Token Token With Up Arrow Star Token Seller's Token Honey Token Champion's Token Freeze Token Memory Token Canned Token Mana Filled Token Annoying Token Power Up Token Nullification Token Construction Token

Click on the token, then pick a Tower on the field. That Tower will gain Annoyance.
‚ö†Ô∏èToken is consumed upon use.AnnoyanceAfter taking damage, Annoyance goes down by 1, nullifying the damage. Annoyance is restored at the start of each round.

Select a Tower on the field. Gives the Tower canned grace - at the end of the turn the Tower will receive rations

Select a Tower on the field. You can only select from Towers of level 5 or higher.
The selected Tower will gain +10 to damage and HP, and then increase its damage and HP by 10% permanently.
Click on the token, then pick a Tower on the field. That Tower will gain a level. Token is consumed upon use.
Select a Tower from the Tower Store. This Tower will remain in the Tower Store until you buy it.
Select a Tower on the field. This Tower will be turned into a Honey Tower. In the next round, all Towers in the Tower Store will be Bee Towers.

Click on the token, then select a Tower. An infusion of mana will be made for the selected Tower, but without spending mana (max. 20 mana).
After use, the token disappears.
Mana InfusionSelect a Tower. Click on the token, then select a Tower in the Tower Store. The selected Tower is removed and no longer appears in the Tower Store.
Click on the token, then pick a Tower on the field. That Tower will gain +25 damage and +25 HP. Token is consumed upon use.
Click on the token, then pick a Tower on the field. That Tower will be removed from the field.
Select a Tower on the field. The Tower will be permanently removed from the field and you will receive gold equal to the level of the removed Tower multiplied by 2.
Select a Tower on the field. A Tower of that type will be added to the Tower Store.
Select a Tower on the field. The maximum level of this Tower is increased by 2.
